headline: Compared to Estimates, Ameren (AEE) Q1 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
summary: The headline numbers for Ameren (AEE) give insight into how the company performed in the quarter ended March 2025, but it may be worthwhile to compare some of its key metrics to Wall Street estimates and the year-ago actuals.

headline: Ameren (AEE) Q1 Earnings Miss Estimates
summary: Ameren (AEE) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -0.93% and 5.73%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Ameren (AEE) Q1 Earnings Miss Estimates

headline: Ameren: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
summary: ST LOUIS (AP) — Ameren Corp. AEE) on Thursday reported first-quarter net income of $289 million. The St. Louis-based company said it had net income of $1.07 per share.

raw.headline: Ameren: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: ST LOUIS (AP) — Ameren Corp. AEE) on Thursday reported first-quarter net income of $289 million. The St. Louis-based company said it had net income of $1.07 per share.

headline: Ameren Announces First Quarter 2025 Results
summary: Ameren Corporation (NYSE: AEE) today announced first quarter 2025 net income attributable to common shareholders of $289 million, or $1.07 per diluted share, compared to first quarter 2024 GAAP net income of $261 million, or $0.98 per diluted share. Excluding certain prior year charges discussed below, Ameren recorded first quarter 2024 adjusted net income attributable to common shareholders of $272 million, or $1.02 per diluted share.

Excluding certain prior year charges discussed below, Ameren recorded first quarter 2024 adjusted net income attributable to common shareholders of $272 million, or $1.02 per diluted share.
